Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Hofton Avenue, south of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The massive City Walls on the north side of the road are a constant reminder of what lies outside the city. Although there hasn't really been a major offensive against the city in over half a century, the threat of invasion is always present and the city garrison is always in top form, ready to take on any threat that might come its way.
